Title: Establishes patient safety and quality assurance measures regarding the distribution of patient-specific medication from an insurer-designated pharmacy
Summary: Establishes patient safety and quality assurance measures regarding the distribution of patient-specific medication from an insurer-designated pharmacy; prohibits certain "brown bagging" and "white bagging" policies regarding pharmacy provided medications.
LawCode: Amd §§3217-b & 4325, Ins L; amd §4406-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to establishing patient safety and quality assurance measures regarding the distribution of patient-specific medication from an insurer-designated pharmacy
